com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags
Class DefineFont3

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.Tag
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefinitionTag
          com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefineFont2
              com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefineFont3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class DefineFont3
extends DefineFont2

This tag's structure is identical to DefineFont2. The difference is in the precision of the glyph definition within glyphShapeTable: all EM square coordinates are multiplied by 20 before being added to the tag, thus enabling substantial resolution increase.

Since:
SWF 8.
See Also:
Serialized Form
